Transcription for 1724996

I've got other friends that I went to school with but unfortunately they they've got their lives to live so
Natasha was the only person who made an effort to come and see me and spend time with me.
And does Natasha have a learning disability? No.
And were you in school together? No we just grew up as friends because my parents
were friends and my dad used to do some jobs for her dad as well so we'd see each other on occasions
and it was great.
